summary:
Professional with experience in technology transfer, laboratory in the use of equipment, assembly of tests and chemical analysis. Technical capacity for different areas of agriculture such as greenhouse and field, complete grounds maintenance and landscaping, always focusing on reducing costs, increasing efficiency and lower environmental impacts. 

Graduated in Agronomy and Agribusiness. A curious and flexible professional willing to integrate the different agricultural spectra, providing greater production in the field or in industry.

Multilingual English and Portuguese able to learn and solve problems, with excellent interpersonal and communications skills.

school.name: Centro Universitário da Fundação Educacional de Barretos
Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia de São Paulo - IFSP

profile_positions.description: •	Garden maintenance with the use of different equipment and tools, in different areas of Dublin and different sites, such as houses, residential condominiums and commercial condominiums and college. Execution of landscaping projects in condominiums and design to the residential and commercial sectors.
profile_positions.title: Grounds Maintenance Operative

profile_positions.description:
•	Execution of tests of effectiveness and selectivity of phytosanitary products (herbicides, insecticides, nematicides, fungicides). Setting up experiments on different species and different objectives (weed, fungi, insect pests) in a large-scale field, application of phytosanitary products with different concentrations and application technologies, in different cities and states of the country.
•	Installation and conduction of demonstrative fields of cotton, coffee, sugar cane, eucalyptus, pine, corn, pasture and soy.
•	Creation of a photo bank with different weed species for a future launch of the BASF application for weed recognition
profile_positions.title: Field Trainee

company.name: Laboratory of Ecotoxicology and Pesticide Efficacy - LEEA Brasil

profile_positions.company: Laboratory of Ecotoxicology and Pesticide Efficacy - LEEA Brasil
profile_positions.description:
•	Scientific Initiation Project with PIBIC/UNIFEB scholarship from September 2017 to August 2018. Chemical control of Salvinia molesta in condition of microcosm and evaluation of environmental indicators. In order to assess the effectiveness of imazamox for the control of (Salvinia molesta) and to evaluate environmental indicators.
•	Physico-chemical analysis of water, soils and plants. Aquatic and terrestrial ecotoxicology: Risk analysis, hazardous chemical products, environmental health analysis in degraded environments.
•	Efficacy of algaecides and herbicides in aquatic and terrestrial plants: Evaluation of the efficacy of algaecides and herbicides in laboratory conditions; in plant growth greenhouse conduction; in microsomes and mesocosms.
•	Weed management and monitoring: Weed identification and monitoring; Monitoring and environmental impact studies of pesticides and chemicals in terrestrial environment.
profile_positions.title: Internship in field and laboratory research

profile_positions.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
profile_positions.description:
•	Internship with scholarship in the Prospecting, Articulation and Evaluation sector of the National Agroindustrial Technology Research Center of food - Embrapa Food Agroindustry – CTAA.
•	Assist communication actions, compilation of activities with the twenty-seven family agroindustries characterized and diagnosed in terms of conformities, in the compilation of interviews conducted with extension technicians and agroindustries.
•	Mobilization of local partners from nine states in Brazil, for the beginning of the execution of the work to internalize the Good Manufacturing Practices together with twenty seven agro-industries.
•	Create an image bank, reports and search for official information on matters related to food safety and design a website with information.
profile_positions.title: Internship in Good Manufacturing Practices
